IronXL - The Excel Library for C# and .Net Projects.

Create, Open, Read and Export XLS and XLS files in C# /.NET Projects without using Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel

Supports: XLS/XLSX/CSV/TSV/JSON and XML
Platforms: .Net Framework 4.5+, Dot Net Core 2.0+ , Azure, Xamarin, Mobile & Mono

Please visit https://ironsoftware.com/csharp/excel/ for:
- Code Samples,
- Support,
- MSDN object reference,
- Detailed Community Tutorials.
